column2: SELECT TOP # --P.SpecObjID as objid_P, S.SpecObjID as objid_S, -- P.subclass as class_P, S.subclass as class_S, P.z as z_P, S.z as z_S, N.distance FROM SpecPhotoAll P -- P is the primary object JOIN Neighbors N ON P.ObjID = N.ObjID -- N is the neighbor link JOIN SpecPhotoAll S ON S.ObjID = N.NeighborObjID -- S is a secondary galaxy nearby P WHERE P.ObjID < S.ObjID -- avoid duplicates and P.class = # and (P.subclass = # or P.subclass = #) -- Make sure the primary is starforming/bursting and S.class = # and (S.subclass = # or S.subclass = #) -- Make sure the secondary is starforming/bursting and ( ((#+P.z) *# < (#+S.z) *# and (#+P.z) *# < (#+S.z) *#) -- [O III] # or ( (#+P.z) *# < (#+S.z) *# and (#+P.z) *# < (#+S.z) *#) -- [O III] # or ( (#+P.z) *# < (#+S.z) *# and (#+P.z) *# < (#+S.z) *#) -- Ha or ( (#+P.z) *# < (#+S.z) *# and (#+P.z) *# < (#+S.z) *#) -- Hb or ( (#+P.z) *# < (#+S.z) *# and (#+P.z) *# < (#+S.z) *#) -- Hg)
